title: The Structure of the Treasury Market: What Are We Learning?
content: 2  Figure 1  Daily Volume for On-the-Run and Seasoned Securities by Security Type  Note: TIPS is Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities; FRNs is Floating Rate Notes.  Source: Board staff calculations, based on Trade Reporting and Compliance Engine (TRACE) data from the Financial   Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA). Sample is from August 1, 2017, to July 31, 2018.
